resources.string: An error occurred with this action. Please try again later.
Text field to enter phone number.
An error has occurred, please try again later.
By signing up you agree to our Terms and EULA. See how we use your data in our Privacy Policy.
&app_human_name; requires location to be enabled, do you want to enable it?
Error setting up location. Please manually enable location inside Settings.
Error requesting location. Please make sure to enable location inside Settings.
&app_human_name; requires access to the device location.
Running synchronization and various database cleanup methods. This process should only run once a day for a small amount of time.
\'Requires Info\' Field returned an invalid value of \'%1$s\'.
An invalid return status was received of \'%1$s\' when login function returned \'NO_ERRORS\'.
An invalid phone number was extracted from the database with account type \'%1$s\'.
An error occurred, please try again later.
Please check the attached email of the phone number.
Email is on cool down, please try again later.
No Account exists for the passed phone number.
Unmanageable Error Returned In Login Select Method Fragment.
Verification message is still on cool down.
A new device has been detected attempting to log into an existing account. Would you like to use the existing account or create a new account?
This will permanently delete the existing account associated with this phone number. Are you sure?
Verification code expired, sending new code.
Entered birthday does match birthday on file.
Send message on cool down for %1$d seconds.
An error has occurred. Please try verification again later.
Messenger is still on cool down.
Account requires authorization, verification code has been sent.

Welcome to &app_human_name; & the Go Getter community!

We are EXCITED to have you join us and want to create the BEST EXPERIENCE possible for EVERYONE.
Authenticity is vital for Go Getters. You are AMAZING. So be yourself! Please be honest and verify your age, photos, and bio are AUTHENTICALLY you!
Treat ALL Go Getters with KINDNESS & RESPECT!
Be SAFE & SAVVY about what you share with other Go Getters!
Please REPORT all toxic, malicious, or illegal accounts RUINING the &app_human_name; community & culture!
For a full list of the rules, check out the below link!

At &app_human_name; we NEVER sell your personal information to ANYONE. Instead, the combined influence of all Go Getters allows us to offer FREE merchandise and EXCLUSIVE deals on AWESOME events & products based on the activities you choose!
Watch for our weekly Go Getter newsletter coming soon!
Invalid email address please try again.
Please choose at least one picture in order to continue.
Error picture incompatible. Please choose a different picture.

string.name: select_categories_screen_header
string.font: Don\'t worry you can change or add to them anytime.

resources.string: Error, maximum number of time frames reached. Please delete existing time frame in order to add another.
Error saving selected time frame. Stop point must come after start point.
An error occurred saving the selected time frame. Please try again.
All activities are used. Please remove one in order to add this.
Matching with other people interested in \"%1$s\" anytime!
Error logging in please retry login process.
Please select at least one activity.
Update failed, please leave at least one activity selected.
Invalid info passed please try again.
We would love to hear any feedback from you!
Please try to include what you were doing when the bug occurred. Or if possible list the steps to reproduce the bug.
This will log the account out of this device.
This will permanently delete this account.
Enter a new email address below.
Maximum number of genders to match with reached.
An email has been sent to the selected email address.
Send email is on cool down. Please try again later.
An error occurred sending the email. Please try again later.
Dialog fragment image view for maximizing picture.
Match card user left swipe thumbs down.
Match card user right swipe thumbs up.
No Matches Found.\nTry expanding search criteria by adding activities, changing matching distance etc…
Swipes used up, check back later!
Account has been banned from this chat room.
No chat room with that Id exists.
An age restriction has been set on this chat room. You are too young to join.
Error occurred when joining chat room.
Are you sure you want to leave the chat room?
Are you sure you want to clear the chat room history?
Chat room name has been changed to %1$s.
Chat room name has been removed.
Chat room password has been changed to %1$s.
Chat room password has been removed.
Chat room pinned location has been removed.
Are you sure you want to permanently delete this message?
User is no longer inside chat room.
Error occurred attempting to reply to message.
Message must be sent to server before reply can be used.
Please wait for image to finish downloading before replying.
Account already exists inside this chat room.
Are you sure you want to cancel the match?
%1$s is already a member of selected chat room.
%1$s is not eligible to join selected chat room.
Invite to join chat room sent.
An email will be sent to the selected phone number with further instructions.
Warning: Stop point must come after start point.
Account has been logged in from a different device.
There is no valid way of loading images found on this device.
Account creation failed, you must be at least %1$d years of age to use this app.
This version of &app_human_name; is no longer supported. Please update!
Maximum number of time frames reached. Must delete a time frame to add more.
Unmanageable Error Returned In Login Select Method Fragment.
Failed to promote user to admin.
Lets go uses notifications for chat messages and to show when you have matched with someone. Notifications can also be turned on or off for each chat room individually. Please allow notifications.
You have been kicked from this chat room.
You have been permanently banned from this chat room.

&app_human_name; uniquely matches Go Getters by specified TIME selections(s).\n\nWhen present, the TOP BLUE BAR is ALWAYS the OTHER Go Getters TIME selections(s) & the BOTTOM ORANGE BAR is ALWAYS yours!
For greater detailed tutorials, FAQs & more, please click here.
